EXPERIENCE.title: Software Engineer
EXPERIENCE.description: Responsible for developing customised sofwtare covering both front-end and back-end together with a development team. Maintaining daily client communication, troubleshooting and resolving bugs, technical issues, and performance bottlenecks.

EXPERIENCE.title: Software Engineer Intern
EXPERIENCE.description: Developed custom software solutions for clients, collaborating with agile development team. Improved ERP performance by over 20% for a real client through system optimization.  Led the architectural migration to microservices, enhancing system scalability and maintainability.

PROJECTS_LIST.title: Stack Tower
PROJECTS_LIST.description: Simple 2D stack tower game created using only HTML and CSS. Interesting project for practising positioning and animations.

ABOUTME.achievements: Among my notable achievements is the successful migration of client applications from monolithic architectures to microservices and development of custom software solutions.
